scene_description: Hero character at edge of cliff overlooking vast fantasy landscape

structured_prompt.short_description: The hero stands at the edge of a cliff, overlooking a vast fantasy landscape during the golden hour, conveying introspection and determination.

objects.description: The hero character, standing with feet shoulder-width apart, back slightly arched, hands clenched into fists, wearing worn and practical attire adorned with symbols of significance to their story.
objects.shape_and_color: Earth tones with hints of blue and silver, symbolizing their journey and character development
objects.appearance_details: determined expression with a hint of self-doubt, clenched fists, and a slight arch in their back
objects.pose: static, with a sense of dynamic tension
objects.orientation: facing the landscape, with a slight turn to the right

structured_prompt.background_setting: A vast fantasy landscape with towering mountain ranges, deep valleys, a sprawling city, and a magical forest in the distance, under a soft, warm, golden hour light.

lighting.conditions: Cinematic Rembrandt setup with a Teal/Orange color contrast
lighting.shadow: Soft, with a triangle of light under the eye on the shadow side of the face

aesthetics.composition: Rule of thirds, with the hero placed off-center, looking into the distance
aesthetics.color_scheme: Dominant earth tones with hints of blue and silver, and a warm golden hour glow
aesthetics.mood_atmosphere: Contemplative, with an undercurrent of anticipation and a hint of fear

photographic_characteristics.depth_of_field: f/5.6, keeping the hero in sharp focus and slightly blurring the foreground and background
photographic_characteristics.focus: Sharp on the hero's face and attire
photographic_characteristics.camera_angle: Slight low angle, looking up at the hero

simple_prompt: The hero stands at the edge of a cliff, overlooking a vast fantasy landscape during the golden hour, conveying introspection and determination.. Camera: Slight low angle, looking up at the hero. Lens: 50mm. Lighting: Cinematic Rembrandt setup with a Teal/Orange color contrast
